Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0397 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0397 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.12.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-0397
